_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
mn85:7.6+mn85:7.7^who_else_mentioned: the Blessed One, the Holy One
mn85:7.11+mn85:7.12^who_else_mentioned: the Blessed One, the Holy One

before^mn85:18.7^where: the land of the Bhaggas on Crocodile Hill, in the deer park at Bhesakaḷā's Wood
where: the land of the Bhaggas on Crocodile Hill, in the deer park at Bhesakaḷā's Wood
